meanings.definition: A plant of the rose family with compound leaves and small, dark red flowers.
meanings.sent1: The burnets in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I saw a lovely burnets while walking in the park.
meanings.sent3: The burnets seemed to be whispering secrets to the other flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a tapestry of burnets, each one a unique story.
meanings.sent5: The burnets stood out like tiny crimson jewels in the greenery.

meanings.sent1: A burnets fluttered gracefully by my window.
meanings.sent2: The burnets landed delicately on the flower petal.
meanings.sent3: The burnets seemed to be playing hide and seek with the other butterflies.
meanings.sent4: Her happiness danced around her like a burnets in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The burnets' wings shimmered like a piece of the evening sky.

meanings.definition: A type of fabric with a raised pattern.
meanings.sent1: She wore a dress made of burnets to the party.
meanings.sent2: The burnets fabric felt soft against my skin.
meanings.sent3: The burnets pattern on the fabric looked like tiny flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her curtains were made of burnets, adding elegance to the room.
meanings.sent5: The burnets design on the fabric was intricate and beautiful.
